prompts: Create a butterfly Pokemon with sparkling wings and a gentle demeanor.
Imagine a bug-type Pokemon that flutters gracefully through lush forests.
Show me a Pokemon with vibrant colors and large, colorful wings.
Design a fairy-like Pokemon that attracts flowers with its beauty.
Generate a Pokemon that embodies the essence of spring with its delicate features.
Give me a cute insect Pokemon that loves to play in flower fields.
Make a whimsical Pokemon that dances in the sunlight and glows softly.
